subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|臤|肉|alt2=⺼|t2=meat; flesh|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – a body part, the kidneys.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=shèn
|m-s=sen4
|c=san6,san5,san5-2
|c_note=san6 - literary (“kidney; testicle”); san5, san5-2 - vernacular (“gizzard”)
|c-t=sin5
|g=siin5
|h=pfs=sṳn;gd=sen4
|j=seng3
|mb=sēng
|md=sêng
|mn=sīn/xm,zz,tw:siān/qz:siǎn
|mn_note=sīn - literary; siān/siǎn - vernacular
|mn-t=siang6/siêng6
|w=3zen
|x=shen4
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}

subSections.text:
